name: KAZU-10
description:
Level 4/5 Group Project 

Take turns with another player to fire bullets from a moving cannon to try and destroy the most targets across 24 levels.

Group 11: 

Razvan Muresan - Level 5  Designer

Tyler Martignetti - Level 4 Programmer

Joseph Shuttlewood - Level 4 Programmer

John Rance - Level 4 Designer
